headline: House Jan. 6 panel discusses seeking testimony from Ginni Thomas about texts with Mark Meadows, but makes no decision
author: Bart Jansen
sentences: WASHINGTON – The House committee investigating the Capitol attack discussed Monday whether to seek testimony from Virginia “Ginni” Thomas, the wife of Supreme Court Associate Justice Clarence Thomas, about her text message exchanges about the 2020 presidential election with former White House chief of staff Mark Meadows.
